name: Stealth Game (jacobsmith3204)
description:
any key to start...

i've been playing around with a 3d pixelart engine for quite a while now, so it seemed obvious to use it for this. i could do an in depth tutorial if people want to know how.

i hope to update it soon with content that already exists but didnt have enough time implementing it, animations and sound effects and music.

just wanted to have something to show for now.

 Controls

use the leftmouse button to throw coins to where the mouse positions is. 

"wasd" to move and "e" to interact with things 

levels end when you enter a trigger and push "e"
